00025 
00032 double 
00033 pointBoxDistanceSq(const BoundingBox &box, const position &p)
00034 {
00035         vec3 v = (p - position::ORIGIN) - box.getTran().translation();
00036         mat3 RMat;
00037         box.getTran().rotation().ToRotationMatrix(RMat);
00038 
00039     double sqDist = 0.0;
00040     for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00041                 double d = v % RMat.row(i);
00042                 double excess = 0.0;
00043         // Project vector from box center to p on each axis, getting the distance
00044         // of p along that axis, and count any excess distance outside box extents
00045                 if (d < -box.halfSize[i])
00046                         excess = d + box.halfSize[i];
00047                 else if (d > box.halfSize[i])
00048                         excess = d - box.halfSize[i];
00049                 sqDist += excess * excess;
00050     }
00051     return sqDist;
00052 }
00053 
00057 position 
00058 closestPtBbox(const BoundingBox &bbox, const position &p)
00059 {
00060         vec3 d = (p - position::ORIGIN) - bbox.getTran().translation();
00061         mat3 RMat;
00062         bbox.getTran().rotation().ToRotationMatrix(RMat);
00063     // Start result at center of box; make steps from there
00064         vec3 q = bbox.getTran().translation();
00065     // For each OBB axis...
00066     for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00067         // project d onto that axis to get the distance
00068         // along the axis of d from the box center
00069                 double dist = d % RMat.row(i);
00070         // If distance farther than the box extents, clamp to the box
00071                 if (dist > bbox.halfSize[i]) dist = bbox.halfSize[i];
00072                 if (dist < -bbox.halfSize[i]) dist = -bbox.halfSize[i];
00073         // Step that distance along the axis to get world coordinate
00074                 q += dist * RMat.row(i);
00075     }
00076         return position( q.x(), q.y(), q.z() );
00077 }
00078 
00079 void 
00080 BoundingBox::applyTransform(const transf &t)
00081 {
00082         DBGP("\noriginal: " << tran);
00083         DBGP("modifier: " << t);
00084         mTran = mTran * t;
00085         mTranInv = mTran.inverse();
00086 }
00087 
00088 bool
00089 bboxOverlap(const BoundingBox &bb1, const BoundingBox &bb2, const transf &tran2To1)
00090 {
00091         int i, k;
00092 
00093         DBGP("Box1 transform:\n" << bb1.getTran());
00094         DBGP("Box2 transform:\n" << bb2.getTran());
00095 
00096         transf BtoA = bb2.getTran() * tran2To1 * bb1.getTranInv();
00097         mat3 RMat;
00098         BtoA.rotation().ToRotationMatrix(RMat);
00099 
00100         double B[3][3];
00101         for( i=0; i<3 ; i++ ) {
00102                 for( k=0; k<3 ; k++ ) {
00103                         B[i][k] = RMat.element(k,i);
00104                 }
00105         }
00106 
00107         //translation between box centers
00108         vec3 T = BtoA.translation();
00109         DBGP("T: \n" << T);
00110 
00111         vec3 a = bb1.halfSize;
00112         vec3 b = bb2.halfSize;
00113 
00114   double t, s;
00115   register int r;
00116   double Bf[3][3];
00117   const double reps = 1e-6;
00118   
00119   // Bf = fabs(B)
00120   Bf[0][0] = fabs(B[0][0]);  Bf[0][0] += reps;
00121   Bf[0][1] = fabs(B[0][1]);  Bf[0][1] += reps;
00122   Bf[0][2] = fabs(B[0][2]);  Bf[0][2] += reps;
00123   Bf[1][0] = fabs(B[1][0]);  Bf[1][0] += reps;
00124   Bf[1][1] = fabs(B[1][1]);  Bf[1][1] += reps;
00125   Bf[1][2] = fabs(B[1][2]);  Bf[1][2] += reps;
00126   Bf[2][0] = fabs(B[2][0]);  Bf[2][0] += reps;
00127   Bf[2][1] = fabs(B[2][1]);  Bf[2][1] += reps;
00128   Bf[2][2] = fabs(B[2][2]);  Bf[2][2] += reps;
00129 
00130   // if any of these tests are one-sided, then the polyhedra are disjoint
00131   r = 1;
00132 
00133   // A1 x A2 = A0
00134   t = fabs(T[0]);
00135   
00136   r &= (t <= 
00137           (a[0] + b[0] * Bf[0][0] + b[1] * Bf[0][1] + b[2] * Bf[0][2]));
00138   if (!r) return false;
00139   
00140   // B1 x B2 = B0
00141   s = T[0]*B[0][0] + T[1]*B[1][0] + T[2]*B[2][0];
00142   t = fabs(s);
00143 
00144   r &= ( t <=
00145           (b[0] + a[0] * Bf[0][0] + a[1] * Bf[1][0] + a[2] * Bf[2][0]));
00146   if (!r) return false;
00147     
00148   // A2 x A0 = A1
00149   t = fabs(T[1]);
00150   
00151   r &= ( t <= 
00152           (a[1] + b[0] * Bf[1][0] + b[1] * Bf[1][1] + b[2] * Bf[1][2]));
00153   if (!r) return false;
00154 
00155   // A0 x A1 = A2
00156   t = fabs(T[2]);
00157 
00158   r &= ( t <= 
00159           (a[2] + b[0] * Bf[2][0] + b[1] * Bf[2][1] + b[2] * Bf[2][2]));
00160   if (!r) return false;
00161 
00162   // B2 x B0 = B1
00163   s = T[0]*B[0][1] + T[1]*B[1][1] + T[2]*B[2][1];
00164   t = fabs(s);
00165 
00166   r &= ( t <=
00167           (b[1] + a[0] * Bf[0][1] + a[1] * Bf[1][1] + a[2] * Bf[2][1]));
00168   if (!r) return false;
00169 
00170   // B0 x B1 = B2
00171   s = T[0]*B[0][2] + T[1]*B[1][2] + T[2]*B[2][2];
00172   t = fabs(s);
00173 
00174   r &= ( t <=
00175           (b[2] + a[0] * Bf[0][2] + a[1] * Bf[1][2] + a[2] * Bf[2][2]));
00176   if (!r) return false;
00177 
00178   // A0 x B0
00179   s = T[2] * B[1][0] - T[1] * B[2][0];
00180   t = fabs(s);
00181   
00182   r &= ( t <= 
00183         (a[1] * Bf[2][0] + a[2] * Bf[1][0] +
00184          b[1] * Bf[0][2] + b[2] * Bf[0][1]));
00185   if (!r) return false;
00186   
00187   // A0 x B1
00188   s = T[2] * B[1][1] - T[1] * B[2][1];
00189   t = fabs(s);
00190 
00191   r &= ( t <=
00192         (a[1] * Bf[2][1] + a[2] * Bf[1][1] +
00193          b[0] * Bf[0][2] + b[2] * Bf[0][0]));
00194   if (!r) return false;
00195 
00196   // A0 x B2
00197   s = T[2] * B[1][2] - T[1] * B[2][2];
00198   t = fabs(s);
00199 
00200   r &= ( t <=
00201           (a[1] * Bf[2][2] + a[2] * Bf[1][2] +
00202            b[0] * Bf[0][1] + b[1] * Bf[0][0]));
00203   if (!r) return false;
00204 
00205   // A1 x B0
00206   s = T[0] * B[2][0] - T[2] * B[0][0];
00207   t = fabs(s);
00208 
00209   r &= ( t <=
00210           (a[0] * Bf[2][0] + a[2] * Bf[0][0] +
00211            b[1] * Bf[1][2] + b[2] * Bf[1][1]));
00212   if (!r) return false;
00213 
00214   // A1 x B1
00215   s = T[0] * B[2][1] - T[2] * B[0][1];
00216   t = fabs(s);
00217 
00218   r &= ( t <=
00219           (a[0] * Bf[2][1] + a[2] * Bf[0][1] +
00220            b[0] * Bf[1][2] + b[2] * Bf[1][0]));
00221   if (!r) return false;
00222 
00223   // A1 x B2
00224   s = T[0] * B[2][2] - T[2] * B[0][2];
00225   t = fabs(s);
00226 
00227   r &= (t <=
00228           (a[0] * Bf[2][2] + a[2] * Bf[0][2] +
00229            b[0] * Bf[1][1] + b[1] * Bf[1][0]));
00230   if (!r) return false;
00231 
00232   // A2 x B0
00233   s = T[1] * B[0][0] - T[0] * B[1][0];
00234   t = fabs(s);
00235 
00236   r &= (t <=
00237           (a[0] * Bf[1][0] + a[1] * Bf[0][0] +
00238            b[1] * Bf[2][2] + b[2] * Bf[2][1]));
00239   if (!r) return false;
00240 
00241   // A2 x B1
00242   s = T[1] * B[0][1] - T[0] * B[1][1];
00243   t = fabs(s);
00244 
00245   r &= ( t <=
00246           (a[0] * Bf[1][1] + a[1] * Bf[0][1] +
00247            b[0] * Bf[2][2] + b[2] * Bf[2][0]));
00248   if (!r) return false;
00249 
00250   // A2 x B2
00251   s = T[1] * B[0][2] - T[0] * B[1][2];
00252   t = fabs(s);
00253 
00254   r &= ( t <=
00255           (a[0] * Bf[1][2] + a[1] * Bf[0][2] +
00256            b[0] * Bf[2][1] + b[1] * Bf[2][0]));
00257   if (!r) return false;
00258 
00259   return true;  // should equal 0
00260 }
00261 
00262 double bboxDistanceApp(const BoundingBox &bb1, const BoundingBox &bb2)
00263 {
00264         //for now a placeholder: return the distance as if they were bounding spheres
00265         //uses three sqrt's, maybe could use less
00266 
00267         vec3 t = bb1.getTran().translation() - bb2.getTran().translation();
00268         double dist = t.len();
00269         dist -= bb1.halfSize.len();
00270         dist -= bb2.halfSize.len();
00271         return dist;
00272 }
00273 
00274 double bboxDistanceSq(const BoundingBox &bb1, const BoundingBox &bb2, const transf &tran2To1)
00275 {
00276         //trying to use the separating axis theorem to get a better distance bound
00277         int i, k;
00278 
00279         transf BtoA = bb2.getTran() * tran2To1 * bb1.getTranInv();
00280         mat3 RMat;
00281         BtoA.rotation().ToRotationMatrix(RMat);
00282 
00283         double B[3][3];
00284         for( i=0; i<3 ; i++ ) {
00285                 for( k=0; k<3 ; k++ ) {
00286                         B[i][k] = RMat.element(k,i);
00287                 }
00288         }
00289 
00290         //translation between box centers
00291         vec3 T = BtoA.translation();
00292 
00293         vec3 a = bb1.halfSize;
00294         vec3 b = bb2.halfSize;
00295 
00296         double Bf[3][3];
00297         const double reps = 1e-6;
00298   
00299         // Bf = fabs(B)
00300         Bf[0][0] = fabs(B[0][0]);  Bf[0][0] += reps;
00301         Bf[0][1] = fabs(B[0][1]);  Bf[0][1] += reps;
00302         Bf[0][2] = fabs(B[0][2]);  Bf[0][2] += reps;
00303         Bf[1][0] = fabs(B[1][0]);  Bf[1][0] += reps;
00304         Bf[1][1] = fabs(B[1][1]);  Bf[1][1] += reps;
00305         Bf[1][2] = fabs(B[1][2]);  Bf[1][2] += reps;
00306         Bf[2][0] = fabs(B[2][0]);  Bf[2][0] += reps;
00307         Bf[2][1] = fabs(B[2][1]);  Bf[2][1] += reps;
00308         Bf[2][2] = fabs(B[2][2]);  Bf[2][2] += reps;
00309 
00310         double d, maxD = -1.0e10;
00311         double t, s;
00312         double a0,a1,a2,b0,b1,b2;
00313 
00314 
00315         // A1 x A2 = A0
00316         t = fabs(T[0]);  
00317         d = t - (a[0] + b[0] * Bf[0][0] + b[1] * Bf[0][1] + b[2] * Bf[0][2]);
00318         a0 = std::max(0.0, d); a0*=a0;
00319      
00320         // A2 x A0 = A1
00321         t = fabs(T[1]);
00322         d = t - (a[1] + b[0] * Bf[1][0] + b[1] * Bf[1][1] + b[2] * Bf[1][2]);
00323         a1 = std::max(0.0, d); a1*=a1;
00324 
00325         // A0 x A1 = A2
00326         t = fabs(T[2]);
00327         d = t - (a[2] + b[0] * Bf[2][0] + b[1] * Bf[2][1] + b[2] * Bf[2][2]);
00328         a2 = std::max(0.0, d); a2*=a2;
00329 
00330         // B1 x B2 = B0
00331         s = T[0]*B[0][0] + T[1]*B[1][0] + T[2]*B[2][0];
00332         t = fabs(s);
00333         d = t - (b[0] + a[0] * Bf[0][0] + a[1] * Bf[1][0] + a[2] * Bf[2][0]);
00334         b0 = std::max(0.0, d); b0*=b0;
00335 
00336         // B2 x B0 = B1
00337         s = T[0]*B[0][1] + T[1]*B[1][1] + T[2]*B[2][1];
00338         t = fabs(s);
00339         d = t - (b[1] + a[0] * Bf[0][1] + a[1] * Bf[1][1] + a[2] * Bf[2][1]);
00340         b1 = std::max(0.0, d); b1*=b1;
00341 
00342         // B0 x B1 = B2
00343         s = T[0]*B[0][2] + T[1]*B[1][2] + T[2]*B[2][2];
00344         t = fabs(s);
00345         d = t - (b[2] + a[0] * Bf[0][2] + a[1] * Bf[1][2] + a[2] * Bf[2][2]);
00346         b2 = std::max(0.0, d); b2*=b2;
00347 
00348         maxD = std::max(a0+a1+a2, b0+b1+b2);
00349 //      if (maxD == 0.0) return -1;
00350 //      return maxD;
00351 
00352         //---- edge cross product tests
00353 
00354         // A0 x B0
00355         s = T[2] * B[1][0] - T[1] * B[2][0];
00356         t = fabs(s);
00357     d = t - (a[1] * Bf[2][0] + a[2] * Bf[1][0] + b[1] * Bf[0][2] + b[2] * Bf[0][1]);
00358         d = std::max(0.0, d); d*=d;
00359         maxD = std::max(maxD, std::max(a0+d, b0+d));
00360   
00361         // A0 x B1
00362         s = T[2] * B[1][1] - T[1] * B[2][1];
00363         t = fabs(s);
00364         d = t - (a[1] * Bf[2][1] + a[2] * Bf[1][1] + b[0] * Bf[0][2] + b[2] * Bf[0][0]);
00365         d = std::max(0.0, d); d*=d;
00366         maxD = std::max(maxD, std::max(a0+d, b1+d));
00367 
00368         // A0 x B2
00369         s = T[2] * B[1][2] - T[1] * B[2][2];
00370         t = fabs(s);
00371         d = t - (a[1] * Bf[2][2] + a[2] * Bf[1][2] + b[0] * Bf[0][1] + b[1] * Bf[0][0]);
00372         d = std::max(0.0, d); d*=d;
00373         maxD = std::max(maxD, std::max(a0+d, b2+d));
00374 
00375         // A1 x B0
00376         s = T[0] * B[2][0] - T[2] * B[0][0];
00377         t = fabs(s);
00378         d = t - (a[0] * Bf[2][0] + a[2] * Bf[0][0] + b[1] * Bf[1][2] + b[2] * Bf[1][1]);
00379         d = std::max(0.0, d); d*=d;
00380         maxD = std::max(maxD, std::max(a1+d, b0+d));
00381 
00382         // A1 x B1
00383         s = T[0] * B[2][1] - T[2] * B[0][1];
00384         t = fabs(s);
00385         d = t - (a[0] * Bf[2][1] + a[2] * Bf[0][1] + b[0] * Bf[1][2] + b[2] * Bf[1][0]);
00386         d = std::max(0.0, d); d*=d;
00387         maxD = std::max(maxD, std::max(a1+d, b1+d));
00388 
00389         // A1 x B2
00390         s = T[0] * B[2][2] - T[2] * B[0][2];
00391         t = fabs(s);
00392         d = t - (a[0] * Bf[2][2] + a[2] * Bf[0][2] + b[0] * Bf[1][1] + b[1] * Bf[1][0]);
00393         d = std::max(0.0, d); d*=d;
00394         maxD = std::max(maxD, std::max(a1+d, b2+d));
00395 
00396         // A2 x B0
00397         s = T[1] * B[0][0] - T[0] * B[1][0];
00398         t = fabs(s);
00399         d = t - (a[0] * Bf[1][0] + a[1] * Bf[0][0] + b[1] * Bf[2][2] + b[2] * Bf[2][1]);
00400         d = std::max(0.0, d); d*=d;
00401         maxD = std::max(maxD, std::max(a2+d, b0+d));
00402 
00403         // A2 x B1
00404         s = T[1] * B[0][1] - T[0] * B[1][1];
00405         t = fabs(s);
00406         d = t - (a[0] * Bf[1][1] + a[1] * Bf[0][1] + b[0] * Bf[2][2] + b[2] * Bf[2][0]);
00407         d = std::max(0.0, d); d*=d;
00408         maxD = std::max(maxD, std::max(a2+d, b1+d));
00409 
00410         // A2 x B2
00411         s = T[1] * B[0][2] - T[0] * B[1][2];
00412         t = fabs(s);
00413         d = t - (a[0] * Bf[1][2] + a[1] * Bf[0][2] + b[0] * Bf[2][1] + b[1] * Bf[2][0]);
00414         d = std::max(0.0, d); d*=d;
00415         maxD = std::max(maxD, std::max(a2+d, b2+d));
00416 
00417         if (maxD == 0.0) return -1;
00418         return maxD;
00419 }
